body.name: COBETE Kitchen Sink Splash Guard, 5°Slope 24in Faucet Mat Splash Catcher, Handle Drip Catcher Tray, Multipurpose for Kitchen Dish Drying Mats Sponge Holder and Bathroom Countertop Protect
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 1 hr 24 mins
features: 24IN ULTRA LONG DESIGN:The regular sink splash guard is only 14in. Our newly upgraded faucet splash catcher measures 24in. Extra long kitchen sink splash guard designed to fit most sinks! Besides after the ordinary kitchen faucet absorbent mat is used, the water will still soak the countertop. But Our faucet splash protector has automatic drainage function to keep countertops clean with ease!

SHEARABLE DESIGN: The kitchen faucet splash guard has a 2.75in cutting hole in the middle,can be cut according to the size of the faucet to achieve a perfect fit! (note: Suitable for faucets with a diameter less than 2.55 inches)

NEW 5 ° SLOPE DESIGN:We have adopted a new 5 ° slope design, which allows the water captured by the kitchen sink splash guard to flow into the sink faster, thereby drying the kitchen sink faster. You don't need to worry about water leaving on the sink and bathroom counter anymore!

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: This is more than just a silicone sink splash guard: it can become your shelf for your toothbrush, mug, hand sanitizer when used in the bathroom! Washing dishes in the kitchen can become a kitchen sponge holder, place your sponge, dishwashing liquid! When the dishes are done, they can be your dish drying mats to help you drain the excess water out of the bowl!

WIPE FREE: Do you always wipe down the sink countertop after using the faucet? Hand it over to this kitchen sink mats, it frees up your hands, reduces the frequency of wiping, always keep your countertop clean and tidy!

EASY TO CLEAN: Are you tired of using the cloth faucet absorbent mat that needs to be cleaned frequently, it will produce bad smells after long-term use, and it cannot be dried quickly! Our kitchen sink splash guard is made of food grade silicone and is easy to clean. Just rinse with water! At the same time sink splash guard silicone is also suitable for machine wash!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Better Solution Of Sink Splash Guard COBETE sink splash guard is the perfect solution for faucet splashes! Faucet splash guard adopts multi-directional adaptive and adjustable design! Fits perfectly into your faucets and sinks to help collect and drain water that accidentally drips while washing dishes, washing hands, washing vegetables or fruits, and more. This keeps the countertop clean and dry at all times, so you don't have to keep using a towel or paper towel to wipe down sink stains!

Why Choose COBETE Sink Splash Guard The kitchen faucet mat is made of silicone and is easy to clean (machine washable)! The Kitchen Sink Splash Guard has a 2.75in clippable adaptive hole in the middle for faucets less than 2.55in diameter! Adopting a brand new 5 ° slope design! Smooth drainage and faster drying! 24in extra long kitchen sink splash guard designed to fit most sinks! In addition to preventing water splashes, the kitchen backsplash protector can also be used as a storage rack, sponge rack, and drain rack! Not only can be used in the kitchen, but also in the bathroom, countertop, RV! The sink splatter guard is reusable and will not produce odor due to prolonged use!
Shearable Design 5 ° Slope Design Independent Shelf Design Heightening Design On All Sides

The Kitchen Sink Splash Guard is 24 inches long and 5.51 inches wide. There is a 2.75-inch adaptive hole in the middle of the Kitchen Sink Splash Guard, and one 5.11-inch and two 1.96-inch drainage hole on the of the lower side;The diameter of the faucet must be less than 2.55 inches to be compatible with this product;The distance between the two drainage holes is 19.68 inches, and the length of the sink should be greater than 19.68, otherwise the water will be discharged onto the countertop;The Kitchen Sink Splash Guard is 5.51 inches wide, with a width of 1.38 inches at the back. The distance from the wall to the faucet is required to be greater than 1.38 inches;If there is a liquid outlet on the side of your sink, it is required that the distance from the faucet to this protrusion be greater than 12 inches Kitchen Sink Splash Guard.
Specification Material : 100% food grade siliconeColor : GreyDimensions: 24" x 5.51"x 0.59"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This will work for purpose intended. The back should have been a little wider,at the bend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: 10/12/2023 UPDATE: Although the product wasn't the right fit for me, I want to commend the seller for great customer service. They initiated contact with me to try to make things right. I would definitely do business with them again.This item performs poorly. There is not sufficient slant to make it drain properly. It won't fit around some of the larger faucets. It description is deceptive. It shows the back of the splash guard folded up. It won't stay up unless it is resting against the wall behind the faucet (but the splash guard isn't deep enough to reach the wall. ) I bought a different splash guard & it is much more functional. It has an actual lip around it, and the water doesn't run off the back or the sides. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BJQKKP83?ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details&th=1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s not “cute” or sleek, but it works. It’s a little short for my sink, but I’m using it and fine with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my sink more dry and tidier
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the few sink guards that had a back wall. I wanted this so as to not let water find its way behind the guard as easily. It's wide and deep enough that I can put a few small bottles of dish and hand soap on each side without it being cramped.This fit my kitchen sink spout well. I could have cut it a little wider, but I wanted a tighter seal around the hole so as to prevent water from sneaking though.I have yet to clean this thing, though I imagine even with its ability to help drain water that slashes, it should probably be cleaned once a month or so. For $10 bucks this gets the job done well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just What I Needed!
reviews.reviewText: I love this and have purchased 3 of them. I have a craft kitchen in which the counter for the kitchen sink backs to a La Qutina window, so there is a space between the counter and the window to allow the window to open. I saw this and purchased it to keep water from going down the back of my counter. and it works like a charm.....since ther I have purchased 2 more for gifts for friends....

reviews.reviewerName: The tripod stand can easily get broken.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and Practical!
reviews.reviewText: The COBETE Kitchen Sink Splash Guard is a versatile and practical addition to any kitchen. Its 24-inch design provides extensive coverage, effectively preventing water splashes and drips from reaching your countertops. The innovative features such as the faucet mat splash catcher and handle drip catcher tray make it a multifunctional tool, ideal for use in various kitchen activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy, doesn't drain
reviews.reviewText: Bought this 24" sink/ splash protector. It is very flimsy. Very soft and bendy and doesn't stay flat. I like that it's big, and goes end to end with my sink, but it doesn't have a slope or a gradient. things don't really drain well. It's cheap, only $10, so if you want something cheap you got it. But I don't recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flat and not formed like shown!
reviews.reviewText: I hate that this is flat and not formed like shown in pictures! Our sink it in the middle of the island in our kitchen, I was hoping that this would help catch water from being spayed all over soaking the counter, it does nothing besides catch water from our hands. Pretty frustrating. Boring to look at and super flimsy it doesn’t stay seated like I thought it would so water gets underneath it.
